simplified: The Register of Members' Interests is also open for viewing by the public during normal office hours. It is held at the Town Hall, Pinstone Street, Sheffield.

original: It is really important for us to understand what ’ s happening in the housing market, and to be aware of how this may be changing.
simplified: It is really important for us to understand what’s happening in the housing market, and how this may be changing.

original: Using an inventory, which you go through and check with the tenant, should also encourage a tenant to look after the things which are provided as part of the tenancy.
simplified: You chould provide a list of items included with the tenancy, and check it with the tennant.  The tenant should be encouraged to take care of these items.

original: We want to make it as easy as possible for businesses to offer work experience places or other types of support, especially for those who have never offered this before.
simplified: We want to make it as easy as possible for businesses to offer work experience and other types of support, especially for those who have never offered this before.

original: This was supported by a Statement of Special Interest, which you can download below along with the current boundary plan.

original: We can normally supply copies for private study purposes, subject to the usual copyright and Data Protection restrictions.
simplified: We can normally give copies for private study purposes but it depends on the usual copyrights and Data Protection restrictions.

original: In general they are sited in areas where we think air pollution may be at risk of going above Government air pollution objectives.
simplified: In general they are in areas where we think air pollution may risk going above Government air pollution limits.

original: The Corporate Parenting Board have developed the 7 strategic priorities in this document and an action plan for their delivery.
simplified: The Corporate Parenting Board has decided the 7 main priorities in this document.  They have also decided on an action plan to carry out those priorities.

original: All of the aspects of our monitoring relate to the CQC ’ s 5 key questions: safe, effective, caring, responsive and well-led.
simplified: Our monitoring aims to be safe, effective, caring, responsive and well-led. These are the CQC’s 5 key questions.

original: Where a vehicle is sold, the proceeds of any sale will be used to cover the costs of seizing vehicles suspected of waste crimes.
simplified: Where a vehicle is sold, the profits of any sale will be used to pay for the costs of confiscated vehicles that are suspected of waste crimes.

original: You must have at least three years post qualifying experience in child care social work and direct experience of adoption work.
simplified: You must have at least three years post qualifying experience in child care social work. You must also have direct experience of adoption work.

original: It has 6 training rooms that have been designed to support delivery via presentations and Smart Board interactive learning.
simplified: It has 6 training rooms that have been designed to help people give presentations including the Smart Board for interactive learning.

original: In our duty to periodically review historic areas and to publish proposals for their future preservation and enhancement, we undertook a Conservation Area Appraisal in Broomhall.
simplified: It is our duty to check historic areas and publish plans to preserve and improve them. We therefore did a Conservation Area Appraisal in Broomhall.

original: You must make sure the contents of your home are adequately insured as Council Housing Service or the City Council will not compensate you for unexpected damage caused to fittings or personal possessions when Council Housing Service or the Council is not at fault.
simplified: you must make sure the contents of your home are adequately insured. Council housing service or the city council will not cover the costs of unexpected damage caused to fittings or personal possessions. Council housing service or the council is not at fault

original: Millhouses traders' groups have been working independently to organise events that have been very popular with the local community.
simplified: Various groups of Millhouses traders have been working separately to organise events. These events have been very popular with the local community.

original: We have produced a guide to showcase the most innovative and successful HMR projects and share our learning with others who are interested in neighbourhood regeneration.
simplified: We made a guide to show the most creative and successful HMR projects to share with others interested in neighbourhood improvement.

original: Our short history of Sheffield covers: the castle and the manor, the industrial revolution, the rise of the steel city, the First and Second World Wars and Sheffield ’ s recent history.
simplified: Our short history of Sheffield covers; the castle and the manor, the industrial revolution, the rise of the steel city, the First and Second World Wars and recent history.

original: Dust can be fine particles of dry matter generated from all manner of everyday activities including industry, agriculture, construction sites, transport or mineral workings.
simplified: Dust can be small particles of dry material which can be collected from many types of daily activities such as industry, farming, construction sites, transport or mineral incidents.

original: If the premises have not yet been constructed or are due to go under major refurbishment then an application for a provisional statement is required.
simplified: An application for a provisional statement is demanded if the premises have not been organized or are supposed to go under main refurbishment.

original: When you make an application, the details of the application will be published on the website and the information on any licence granted will be included in a public register.
simplified: When you make an app, we will put information about the app on the website. If we give you a licence, we will put information about the licence in a public register.

original: The Phase 1 Study was completed on 9 November 2012 and provides an initial assessment of transport emissions only, and the main contributors to these emissions, including the likely impact of improvements to the vehicle fleet by 2015.
simplified: The Phase 1 Study was completed on 9 November 2012. It provides a first assessment of emissions only from transport. It considers the main contributors to these emissions, and the likely impact of improvements to the vehicle fleet by 2015.
